alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Red River (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 9:13PM CDT until March 21 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Northern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 912 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Idabel, or 22 miles north of Clarksville, moving northeast at 90 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Idabel, Broken Bow, Bagwell, Manchester, Wright City, Valliant, Detroit, Millerton, Haworth, Garvin, Eagletown, Moon, Cerrogordo, Hochatown, Goodlake, Goodwater, Shinewell, Woodland, Redland and Kanawha. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
